name: Dungeon Escape Demo
description:
Dungeon Escape Demo is a free to play puzzle-based short game with the gameplay of an average of 10 minutes. In this game, the player has to find the golden statue and replace it with the golden gargoyle to escape the level. There are a total of 3 gargoyles that the player can interact with, scattered around the dungeon. One of the 3 gargoyles can open the door to the golden statue. This is my first ever game that I have created.

Note: Lower out the graphics settings to medium or high if you have a lower end system.
